title: GTA 3, GTA VC, GTA SA [pl] app mac os x (Cider)
description:
The torrent picture of damage to a game:
-GTA 3-PL.app
-GTA Vice City PL.app
-GTA San Andreas PL.app

1.) GTA 3 AND GTA VICE CITY: START THE WHITE SCREEN APPEARS, WAIT A WHILE AND PRESS KEY "OPTION". ENJOY THE GAME!

2.) GTA SAN ANDREAS: FROM SAVED GAME FILES ARE STORED IN GAME PACKAGE: /Contens/Resources/transgaming/c_drive/Program Files/Rockstar Games/GTA San Andreas/data.

3.) GTA 3 AND GTA VICE CITY: FROM SAVED GAME FILES ARE STORED IN Dokuments folder (GTA 3 User Files and GTA Vice City User Files).

TESTED IN MAC OS X 10.7.


W torrencie obraz dmg z grami:
-GTA 3 PL.app
-GTA Vice City PL.app
-GTA San Andreas PL.app
